summary: This is a press guidance email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, informing media that there will be no hearing in the Jeffrey Epstein case on July 11, 2019, and that the continuation of his detention hearing is scheduled for July 15, 2019, before Judge Berman.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case referenced in the press guidance; his detention hearing is being scheduled.

persons.name: Judge Berman
persons.context: The judge before whom the continuation of Jeffrey Epstein's detention hearing is scheduled.

connections.description: Judge Berman is presiding over the detention hearing for defendant Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Continuation of Epstein Detention Hearing
events.description: The scheduled continuation of the detention hearing for Jeffrey Epstein before Judge Berman.

keyFacts: The press guidance confirms there was no hearing in U.S. v. Jeffrey Epstein on July 11, 2019.
The continuation of Jeffrey Epstein's detention hearing was scheduled for July 15, 2019, at 10:00 a.m.
The hearing was to be held before Judge Berman.
The document is official press guidance from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
